# Introduction

SARS-CoV-2 can survive for up to 28 days on surfaces.[@surfacesurvival] Yet, as of writing this article, the contribution of surface contamination to the spread of SARS-CoV-2 remains poorly understood.[@surfaceinfection]

You can also cite two papers at once, by separating them with a semi-colon.

This sentence has two citations.[@surfacesurvival; @surfaceinfection]
